org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.data
Interface DatasetListener<T extends Tuple2D>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultXYPlot
public interface DatasetListener<T extends Tuple2D>

Tracks modifications to an Datasets container and its constituent Dataset elements.

Method Summary
 void onDatasetAdded(Dataset<T> dataset)
          The dataset that was just added to this container.
 void onDatasetChanged(Dataset<T> dataset, double domainStart, double domainEnd)
          When an Dataset is modified, this method is invoked with an interval which bounds the span of domain encompassing all the changes that took place.
 void onDatasetRemoved(Dataset<T> dataset, int datasetIndex)
          Fired when a dataset is removed from this container.
 

Method Detail

onDatasetChanged

void onDatasetChanged(Dataset<T> dataset,
                      double domainStart,
                      double domainEnd)
When an Dataset is modified, this method is invoked with an interval which bounds the span of domain encompassing all the changes that took place.

onDatasetRemoved

void onDatasetRemoved(Dataset<T> dataset,
                      int datasetIndex)
Fired when a dataset is removed from this container.

Parameters:
dataset - - The dataset that was just removed.
datasetIndex - - the ordinal position of the dataset that was just removed.

onDatasetAdded

void onDatasetAdded(Dataset<T> dataset)
The dataset that was just added to this container.
